entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early in the evening. Risk of a thundershower early in the evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023
